name: BreakLoose
description:
BreakLoose begins with twenty rows of bricks, with each three rows a different color. The color sequence from the right side is red, yellow, green and blue. Using a single ball, the player must knock down as many bricks as possible by using the paddle below to ricochet the ball against the bricks and eliminate them. Ball speed increases at specific intervals

BreakLoose is an addictive free game with great graphics and music.

HOW TO PLAY :
- You can control the trajectory of the ball making it bounce on different parts of the paddle.
- Prevent the ball from falling through the bottom of the screen and remove all the bricks to pass to the next level.
- Try to get the highest score!
